message.content:
cs.SY, cs.RO, cs.MA, cs.AI, cs.LG

The paper proposes a control architecture for coordinating heavy-duty vehicles in a platoon to reduce fuel consumption and greenhouse gas emissions. The paper involves the use of dynamic programming and model predictive control, which are commonly used in the fields of control systems (cs.SY) and robotics (cs.RO). The paper also involves the use of optimization techniques, which are commonly used in the fields of machine learning (cs.MA) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Finally, the paper involves the analysis of simulation results, which is commonly done in the field of machine learning (cs.LG).
